hanzi-su-wiki:
憧

Значения

Стремиться, жаждать; жажда, страстное желание, стремление

Мнемоника

Детское 童 сердце 忄 хочет того, что взрослому уже не интересно.

irresolute; unsettled
нерешительный; неурегулированный

憧憧RSirresolute, indecisive, yearn for
  • young 童 heart 忄: irresolute and yearning for it's parents

purpleculture_examples: 憧憬 [ chōng jǐng ]: to long for; to look forward to; longing; vision for the future

heisig_story: Think of the state of mind you were in as a child with a particularly juvenile yearning.
Keyword_KANJIDIC: yearn after, long for, aspire to, admire, adore
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: тоскуют после, долго, стремятся, восхищаются, обожать
koohiiStory1: A paedophile´s state of mind is to yearn for juveniles.
koohiiStory2: A juvenile´s state of mind tends to go apeshit when they see something they yearn for. Usually involving jumping up and down, tantrums, and other bullshit. (Imagine giving them a big backhand across the face.).
jp_example_words:
憧れ(あこがれ): yearning, longing, aspiration
憧れる(あこがれる): long for, yearn after, admire, be attracted by
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Your soul stands in the village you long for. It's the village you're from, and no matter how far you go, no matter how old you get, your soul is still there, and you yearn for it.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Have you ever been away from your village? Maybe you're far away right now, studying Japanese alone. Can't you feel your body longing for your soul back home?
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: No matter how much you long for it, you can't go back because a cougar (あこが) is in the way. Whenever you try to return to your village to be reunited with the soul you yearn for, a cougar is back, and won't let you in.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: You long for a cougar to leave you alone! You yearn for a cougar to bother someone else!
Ru_Meaning: yearn after, long for, aspire to, admire, adore
Ru_trainchinese: chōng: (графема) мерцание, движение туда и обратно, танец (используется в удвоенной форме)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: a child’s (童) heart (忄) always yearns for something
humanum_full_description_en:
From the " heart " to the " child " sound, it means uneasy. "Shuowen": "Will not be determined. From the heart, the child's voice." Song Yan Yanzhi of the Southern Dynasties "Wen to worship his younger brother": "Six relatives are weak in heart, friends in marriage are crying."

"憧" can mean flickering. Han Jiao-Gan "Yi Lin: Benefits of Small Animals": "Yu is a god-shaped tripod, Bo Yi holds the finger, the axe is high, and he sits alone."

"憧" also means constant contact. "Yi·Xian": "Language, friends follow Ersi." Lu Deming quoted Wang Su as saying: "Language, the exchanges are endless."

"憧" also means ignorance. "Historical Records: The Family of Three Kings": "Chen Qingdi, Chen Tang, etc., should serve righteously and obey their duties, and be foolish not to catch things."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " heart " to the " child " sound, it means uneasy.
humanum_full_description:
從「心」，「童」聲，表示心神不定。《說文》：「意不定也。从心，童聲。」南朝宋顏延之〈祭弟文〉：「六親憧心，姻朋浩泣。」

　　「憧」可表示搖曳。漢焦贛《易林‧小畜之益》：「禹作神鼎，伯益銜指，斧斤高閣，憧位獨坐。」

　　「憧」也表示來往不絕。《易‧咸》：「憧憧往來，朋從爾思。」陸德明釋文引王肅曰：「憧憧，往來不絕貌。」

　　「憧」還表示愚昧無知。《史記‧三王世家》：「臣青翟、臣湯等，宜奉義遵職，愚憧而不逮事。」
humanum_short_description: 從「心」，「童」聲，表示心神不定。

憧れ(あこがれ): yearning, longing, aspiration
憧れる(あこがれる): long for, yearn after, admire, be attracted by

從「 心 」，「 童 」聲，表示心神不定。《說文》：「意不定也。从心，童聲。」南朝宋顏延之〈祭弟文〉：「六親憧心，姻朋浩泣。」 「 憧 」可表示搖曳。漢焦贛《易林‧小畜之益》：「禹作神鼎，伯益銜指，斧斤高閣，憧位獨坐。」 「 憧 」也表示來往不絕。《易‧咸》：「憧憧往來，朋從爾思。」陸德明釋文引王肅曰：「憧憧，往來不絕貌。」 「 憧 」還表示愚昧無知。《史記‧三王世家》：「臣青翟、臣湯等，宜奉義遵職，愚憧而不逮事。」
From the " heart" to the " child" sound, it means uneasy. "Shuowen": "Will not be determined. From the heart, the child's voice." Song Yan Yanzhi of the Southern Dynasties "Wen to worship his younger brother": "Six relatives are weak in heart, friends in marriage are crying." " 憧" can mean flickering. Han Jiao-Gan "Yi Lin: Benefits of Small Animals": "Yu is a god-shaped tripod, Bo Yi holds the finger, the axe is high, and he sits alone." " 憧" also means constant contact. "Yi·Xian": "Language, friends follow Ersi." Lu Deming quoted Wang Su as saying: "Language, the exchanges are endless." " 憧" also means ignorance. "Historical Records: The Family of Three Kings": "Chen Qingdi, Chen Tang, etc., should serve righteously and obey their duties, and be foolish not to catch things."

憧字的基本解释

憧
chōng
〔憧憧〕往来不定，摇曳不定，如“人影憧憧”。
〔憧憬〕向往，如“憧憧未来”。
心意不定。

憧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chōng］
［《廣韻》尺容切，平鍾，昌。］
(1)心神不定。
(2)摇晃；摇曳。
(3)来往不绝；连绵不断。参见“憧憧”。
(4)通“衝”。直向某一方向而去。
[②]［zhuàng］
［《廣韻》直絳切，去絳，澄。］
愚昩无知。

憧字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　憧； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页403第22
【唐韻】尺容切【集韻】【韻會】昌容切，?音衝。【說文】意不定也，从心童聲。【易·咸卦】憧憧往來。　又【集韻】諸容切，音忪義同。　又【類篇】徒東切，音童。【易·咸卦】憧憧，徐邈讀。　又【集韻】書容切，音舂。與惷同。騃昬也。　又【韻會】徒弄切，音洞。意不定也。　又【五音集韻】直絳切，音䡴。義同。一曰戇憧，愚貌。亦作?。

憧字的源字形

憧字的起名意思

本义指心神不定，也有向往，渴求之意。

[①]［chōng］
["Guangyun" Ruler Rongqie, Pingzhong, Chang. ]
(1) Uncertainty.
(2) Shake; sway.
(3) Constant contact; continuous. See "憧憧".
(4) Through "Chong". Go straight in a certain direction.

["Guangyun" cut straight to crimson, go to crimson, and clear. ]

unsettled
Name meaning
The original meaning refers to the unsettled mind, but also the meaning of yearning and desire.
憧
形声字。心(十)表意,篆书之形像心脏,表示和心神、心思有关;童(1ong )表声,古代将有罪的男子罚为奴隶称童,童
有罪在身,心神惶惑不宁。本义是心意不定。

Пиктофонетические символы.
Сердце (10) выражает смысл. Форма печати подобна сердцу, что означает, что оно связано с разумом и разумом; Тонг (1онг) выражает звук, в древние времена виновных наказывали как рабов и называют детей. Вина в теле, а разум нарушен.
Первоначальное значение неясно.

Кай
chōng
1) нерешительный, колеблющийся
2) 摇晃; 摇曳。
3) см. 憧憬
Radicals: 忄, 立, 里  (soul, stand, village)
Meaning Mnemonic
Your soul stands in the village you long for. It's the village you're from, and no matter how far you go, no matter how old you get, your soul is still there, and you yearn for it.
Have you ever been away from your village? Maybe you're far away right now, studying Japanese alone. Can't you feel your body longing for your soul back home?
Reading Mnemonic
No matter how much you long for it, you can't go back because a cougar (あこが) is in the way. Whenever you try to return to your village to be reunited with the soul you yearn for, a cougar is back, and won't let you in.
You long for a cougar to leave you alone! You yearn for a cougar to bother someone else!
